entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • A/V crash in Comparer<SdkFeatureBand>.Default during dotnet new #42113
  • dotnet sln add: doesn't add MAUI project for Deploy #42108
  • Create a new `dotnet new` template for launchSettings.json #42107
  • dotnet clean and build [or dotnet rebuild] as one command #42096
  • AzureDevops pipeline issue when trying to install .NET 8 Sdk #42093
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/8.0.1xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #42092
  • [NETSDKE2E]Warning "NU1903: Package 'System.Text.Json' 6.0.0 has a known high severity vulnerability, https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-hh2w-p6rv-4g7w" displays after building mstest project in CLI. #42091

Closed

  • Intermittent test project build failures #42045
  • build error with nuget audit #42073
  • dotnet nuget -h|--help doesn't display why #42084

PullRequests

Created

  • Add a top-level --with-system-libs arg to build.sh #42120
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update SB CI to alpine 3.20 #42119
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2493186 #42118
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #42117
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #42116
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #42115
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #42114
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove dead version properties and unnecessary package refs #42109
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Add Alma Linux SB CI leg to validate min glibc support #42106
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add support for targeting Windows version 26100 and update Windows SDK projection versions #42090
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix double build of test packages for Helix #42083
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.1xx #42074
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Revert "Disable templating tests on windows to unblock PR builds" #42051
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update implicit versions for July #42052
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #42080
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #42081
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #42050
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.3xx #42075
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update to the 8.0.7 July release #42054
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Moved src/Assets to test/TestAssets #41924
    untriaged, Area-dotnet new
  • Clean up STJ references Fixes #39902 #40645
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Testing sbrp changes #42028
    DO NOT MERGE
  • Fix detection of torn SDK #41907
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Permit loose manifest priority #41996
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-Workloads, 8.0.8
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #41885
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update .editorconfig template with new defaults #42059
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use PackageDownload in torn builds #41951
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update scancode to 32.2.1 #42079
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Attempt to fix Publish60Hosted_Works test #42061
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
